text: It's too bad Wild Arms 4 and 5 are not available on the PS Store like the first three (yes, I liked 4). This game was especially hard to find and came out at the end of the PS2 cycle so most people missed on what is an awesome western JRPG. I'm still hoping that someday, somehow, we get a Wild Arms 6.
author: SupraDarky

text: SupraDarky I have to say, Supra, thanks for turning me on to this series and its great OSTs. Not having grown up with a PS1, I was not even aware it existed. Canâ€™t wait to finally play one and see what theyâ€™re all about!
author: aberrizo

text: Man I really want a 6th one also. I've played 1-3 so many times it's crazy, and I've played 4 a couple of times also, I liked it a lot. 5 is the only one I haven't played, but I would still absolutely love a 6th Wild Arms game.
author: Collin 255

text: How long has it been since the last Wild Arms game? 12-13 years? Is even Media.Vision still around?
author: allthatishere

text: @allthatishere Oh yeah, Media.Vision are still around to this day, they made the Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth games and also involved with the Valkyria Chronicles series. The problem is that Sony owns the IP of Wild Arms and they're too busy making games mostly made by westerns and focuses on censorship.
author: Joey Ford

text: @Joey Ford Oh, well I'm glad their still around tho. They had a hand in making my childhood something special.
author: allthatishere

text: @allthatishere Media.Vision still exists, but the people who made the first four WA are no longer there.
i'm a huge jrpg fan but i've never played these, their music is amazing though. And i want to platy them so bad would love ports on switch or something.
author: Paper Okami

text: 2, 1 and 5 are the very best to me.
author: Claudio Marcelo Basckeira

text: I'm very angry because we have the remastered of Wild arms 3 (that, in my opinion, it's disgusting), but we don't have the remastered version of Wild Arms 5!
author: Fabio Coppola

text: The best wild arms..
author: Fabio Coppola

text: For some reason 4 is the one I still have trouble finding. For all the odd choices and design flaws that came with this game, I still had a great time with it, and it goes without saying that the soundtrack is fantastic. Thanks for introducing me to the series.

text: It is? I bought mine on ebay a few years back. Wasn't even that expensive. Infact, my shipment got lost in the mail and I got sent a new one. Is it really that rare?

text: @Purple Dawn I'm not entirely sure myself. I got my copy about 5 to 6 years ago for about $25 at a Gamesplus. I haven't seen another copy since then, tho.

text: @allthatishere I saw one at a store after I bought mine. I checked ebay now and there's alot for sale actually. But the price  has risen a bit since I bought mine.
